Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at CTS (HK) Grand Metropark Hotel Beijing places you in the heart of Beijing, convenient to Niujie Mosque and Tiananmen Square. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Tianning Temple Pagoda and Baoguosi Market.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 215 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and minibars. Wired and wireless Internet access is complimentary, while 32-inch LCD televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature deep soaking bathtubs and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Don’t miss out on the many recreational opportunities, including a nightclub, an indoor pool, and a sauna. Additional features include concierge services, gift shops/newsstands, and a hair salon.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 5 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, express check-in, and express check-out. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is available for a surcharge.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 5 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

A stay at CTS (HK) Grand Metropark Hotel Beijing places you in the heart of Beijing, convenient to Niujie Mosque and Tiananmen Square. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Tianning Temple Pagoda and Baoguosi Market.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Niujie Mosque - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Tianning Temple Pagoda - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Baoguosi Market - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Baiyun Guan - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Fayuan Si Buddhist Temple - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Natural History Museum - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Capital Museum - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Grand View Garden - 2.2 km / 1.3 mi
South Cathedral - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Peking Opera - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Xidan Shopping Center - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
Taoranting Park - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Military Museum of the Chinese People's Revolution - 3.3 km / 2 mi
Colored Glaze Factory Cultural Street - 3.3 km / 2.1 mi
Museum of the Chinese Revolution - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi

The preferred airport for CTS (HK) Grand Metropark Hotel Beijing is Beijing (PEK-Capital Intl.) - 29.5 km / 18.3 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
